strapiPost.title: Razorbacks Women's Basketball Climbs In AP Poll
strapiPost.content:
Razorbacks Women's Basketball has had a phenomenal start to the season, holding a 13-0 record and ranked No. 17 in the AP Top 25 Poll.

  • Jump shot: The Razorbacks saw a four-spot jump in the polls after their 83-75 win on Saturday against the previously No. 16 Creighton.
  • Wrapping up: Before heading into conference play, the team will play two games at the San Diego Invitational, tipping off today at 3p against No. 16 Oregon, followed by either No. 3 Ohio State or USF on Wednesday, Dec 21.

Read more about Razorback Women's Basketball HERE.
